main event: A bright, white, stationary object was observed in the night sky over Corpus Christi, Texas on June 21, 1959, for a duration of 40 minutes.
interesting points: The object was stationary and remained visible despite cloud cover.
The observation was classified as an aerial event.
The weather conditions were reported as clear with scattered broken clouds.
The sighting lasted for a significant duration of 40 minutes.
sighted object: bright, white, stationary object in the night sky
